segment.source: Use the Microsoft advertising libraries in the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK to show banner and video interstitial ads in your XAML or JavaScript/HTML apps.
segment.target: Use the Microsoft advertising libraries in the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK to show banner and video interstitial ads in your XAML or JavaScript/HTML apps.

segment.source: Display ads using the Microsoft advertising libraries
segment.target: Display ads using the Microsoft advertising libraries

segment.source: Display ads using the Microsoft advertising libraries
segment.target: Display ads using the Microsoft advertising libraries

segment.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive

segment.source: Use the Microsoft advertising libraries in the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK to show banner and video interstitial ads in your XAML or JavaScript/HTML apps for Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.
segment.target: Use the Microsoft advertising libraries in the Microsoft Store Engagement and Monetization SDK to show banner and video interstitial ads in your XAML or JavaScript/HTML apps for Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.

segment.source: Important The Microsoft advertising libraries are a different set of extensions from the ad mediation libraries.
segment.target: Important The Microsoft advertising libraries are a different set of extensions from the ad mediation libraries.

segment.source: For more information about the differences between the ad mediation and Microsoft advertising libraries, see What is the difference: AdMediatorControl or AdControl.
segment.target: For more information about the differences between the ad mediation and Microsoft advertising libraries, see What is the difference: AdMediatorControl or AdControl.

segment.source: For information about using ad mediation, see Use ad mediation to maximize revenue.
segment.target: For information about using ad mediation, see Use ad mediation to maximize revenue.

segment.source: The following topics provide information about common tasks involving the Windows advertising libraries.
segment.target: The following topics provide information about common tasks involving the Windows advertising libraries.

segment.source: Task
segment.target: Task

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Install and get started using the Microsoft advertising libraries.
segment.target: Install and get started using the Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.target: See Get started with Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.target: Show banner ads in your XAML/C# app.

segment.target: See AdControl in XAML and .NET.

segment.target: Show banner ads in your HTML/JavaScript app.

segment.target: See AdControl in HTML 5 and Javascript.

segment.source: Show a video interstitial ad in your app.
segment.target: Show a video interstitial ad in your app.

segment.target: See Interstitial ads.

segment.source: Download sample projects that demonstrate how to add banner and interstitial ads to apps.
segment.target: Download sample projects that demonstrate how to add banner and interstitial ads to apps.

segment.source: See the Advertising samples on GitHub.
segment.target: See the Advertising samples on GitHub.

segment.target: Handle AdControl errors in your app.

segment.source: See Error handling and the walkthroughs under AdControl error handling.
segment.target: See Error handling and the walkthroughs under AdControl error handling.

segment.source: Report a bug in the Microsoft advertising libraries.
segment.target: Report a bug in the Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.target: Visit the support page.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Get started with the Microsoft advertising libraries
segment.target: Get started with the Microsoft advertising libraries

segment.source: Provides the information you need to get started using the Microsoft advertising libraries to add banner and video interstitial ads to your apps.
segment.target: Provides the information you need to get started using the Microsoft advertising libraries to add banner and video interstitial ads to your apps.

segment.source: Developer information
segment.target: Developer information

segment.source: Provides useful information to developers about the Microsoft advertising libraries, including how to work with ad units and handling errors related to ads.
segment.target: Provides useful information to developers about the Microsoft advertising libraries, including how to work with ad units and handling errors related to ads.

segment.source: Developer walkthroughs
segment.target: Developer walkthroughs

segment.source: Provides walkthroughs that show you how to add banner ads and video interstitial ads to apps by using the Microsoft advertising libraries.
segment.target: Provides walkthroughs that show you how to add banner ads and video interstitial ads to apps by using the Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.source: Code samples
segment.target: Code samples

segment.source: Provides examples that demonstrate how to use the properties, methods, and events of the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries to target users, manually refresh ads, and handle events.
segment.target: Provides examples that demonstrate how to use the properties, methods, and events of the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries to target users, manually refresh ads, and handle events.

segment.source: Troubleshooting guides
segment.target: Troubleshooting guides

segment.source: Describes solutions to common development issues with the Microsoft advertising libraries.
segment.target: Describes solutions to common development issues with the Microsoft advertising libraries.
